short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Be a redditor without losing productivity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Most Redditors will agree that once you open Reddit, time flies and productivity dies. 
At the same time though, Reddit is a source of amazing knowledge and people's first hand experiences and opinions.  

Quick for reddit allows you to view the top posts of the 4 most visited subreddits of yours. Don't waste time, don't lose productivity, and don't miss out on what Reddit has to offer.
